alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 9:40AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern San Diego County through 1015 AM PDT... At 940 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over southeastern Camp Pendleton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oceanside, Vista, Fallbrook, Valley Center, eastern Camp Pendleton, Camp Pendleton North, Bonsall and Hidden Meadows. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
